name: Keith LUTZ, Petitioner, v. TANGLWOOD LAKES COMMUNITY ASSOCIATION, INC., Respondent
name_abbreviation: Lutz v. Tanglwood Lakes Community Ass'n

parties: Keith LUTZ, Petitioner, v. TANGLWOOD LAKES COMMUNITY ASSOCIATION, INC., Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of July, 2005, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, LIMITED to the following issue:
Whether 15 Pa.C.S. § 5726(b) limits the authority to accomplish removal of a director of a nonprofit corporation by its board of directors to cause as delineated by the statute and in the corporation’s bylaws?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
880 A.2d 502
Keith LUTZ, Petitioner, v. TANGLWOOD LAKES COMMUNITY ASSOCIATION, INC., Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 19, 2005.
